ygData.subject: A few questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings one and all! I just joined this mailing list and have a few general questions so please forgive me if they ve already been asked- What are folded
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings one and all! I just joined this mailing list and have a few
general questions so please forgive me if they've already been asked- What
are folded metal sheets used for (not to be confused with metal sheets)?
Anyone know what blade and sledge molds are used for, and what are the
proper combination of items to use it properly? And lastly, I have heard
rumors that there are items that will help you in your "skill roles" when
smithing. Specifically the lucky rats foot. Is this true?
